meeting_info.location: Canopy by Hilton Dallas Uptown, 2950 Cityplace W Blvd, Dallas, Matilda Room 8th Floor and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the President.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check conducted by the Housing Project Manager.

agenda_items.title: Public Comments
agenda_items.description: Opportunity for public comments on items IV – IX.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of Bylaws amendment
agenda_items.description: Discussion regarding amendments to the bylaws of the Corporation.

agenda_items.title: Discussion of potential uses of funds
agenda_items.description: Discussion on how the Corporation's funds may be utilized.

agenda_items.title: Presentation on workforce housing study
agenda_items.description: Presentation and discussion of the October 2024 study on workforce housing costs and benefits.

agenda_items.title: Discussion on targeted areas of development
agenda_items.description: Discussion on aligning development goals with the City of Dallas Housing Policy.

agenda_items.title: Discussion and approval of 2025 Budget
agenda_items.description: Discussion and approval of the Corporation’s budget for 2025.

agenda_items.title: Review of 2025 calendar
agenda_items.description: Review and discussion of the Corporation’s 2025 calendar and planning session.

agenda_items.title: Adjourn
agenda_items.description: Closing of the meeting by the President.

financial_items.description: Discussion and approval of the Corporation’s 2025 Budget
